15: וַיָּ֣הָם <sup>2000 </sup> <n>discomfited</n> יְ֠הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> סִֽיסְרָ֨א <sup>5516 </sup> <n>Sisera</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הָרֶ֧כֶב <sup>7393 </sup> <n>and all [his] chariots</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֛ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>and all [his] host</n> לְפִי־ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>with the edge</n> חֶ֖רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>of the sword</n> לִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> בָרָ֑ק <sup>1301 </sup> <n>Barak</n> וַיֵּ֧רֶד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>lighted down</n> סִֽיסְרָ֛א <sup>5516 </sup> <n>so that Sisera</n> מֵעַ֥ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הַמֶּרְכָּבָ֖ה <sup>4818 </sup> <n>off [his] chariot</n> וַיָּ֥נָס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>and fled away</n> בְּרַגְלָֽיו׃ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>on his feet</n>
16: וּבָרָ֗ק <sup>1301 </sup> <n>But Barak</n> רָדַ֞ף <sup>7291 </sup> <n>pursued</n> אַחֲרֵ֤י <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> הָרֶ֙כֶב֙ <sup>7393 </sup> <n>the chariots</n> וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <sup>310 </sup> <n>And</n> הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>and after the host</n> עַ֖ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>far</n> חֲרֹ֣שֶׁת <sup>2800 </sup> <n>unto Harosheth</n> הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the Gentiles</n> וַיִּפֹּ֞ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>fell</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> מַחֲנֵ֤ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>and all the host</n> סִֽיסְרָא֙ <sup>5516 </sup> <n>of Sisera</n> לְפִי־ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>upon the edge</n> חֶ֔רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>of the sword</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> נִשְׁאַ֖ר <sup>7604 </sup> <n>left</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>even</n> אֶחָֽד׃ <sup>259 </sup> <n>[and] there was not a man</n>
17: וְסִֽיסְרָא֙ <sup>5516 </sup> <n>Howbeit Sisera</n> נָ֣ס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>fled away</n> בְּרַגְלָ֔יו <sup>7272 </sup> <n>on his feet</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֹ֣הֶל <sup>168 </sup> <n>to the tent</n> יָעֵ֔ל <sup>3278 </sup> <n>of Jael</n> אֵ֖שֶׁת <sup>802 </sup> <n>the wife</n> חֶ֣בֶר <sup>2268 </sup> <n>of Heber</n> הַקֵּינִ֑י <sup>7017 </sup> <n>the Kenite</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> שָׁל֗וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>for [there was] peace</n> בֵּ֚ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> יָבִ֣ין <sup>2985 </sup> <n>between Jabin</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> חָצ֔וֹר <sup>2674 </sup> <n>of Hazor</n> וּבֵ֕ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> בֵּ֖ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and the house</n> חֶ֥בֶר <sup>2268 </sup> <n>of Heber</n> הַקֵּינִֽי׃ <sup>7017 </sup> <n>the Kenite</n>
18: וַתֵּצֵ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>went out</n> יָעֵל֮ <sup>3278 </sup> <n>And Jael</n> לִקְרַ֣את <sup>7125 </sup> <n>to meet</n> סִֽיסְרָא֒ <sup>5516 </sup> <n>Sisera</n> וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אֵלָ֗יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> סוּרָ֧ה <sup>5493 </sup> <n>unto him Turn in</n> אֲדֹנִ֛י <sup>113 </sup> <n>my lord</n> סוּרָ֥ה <sup>5493 </sup> <n>turn in</n> אֵלַ֖י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּירָ֑א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>to me fear</n> וַיָּ֤סַר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>not And when he had turned in</n> אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to her</n> הָאֹ֔הֱלָה <sup>168 </sup> <n>unto her into the tent</n> וַתְּכַסֵּ֖הוּ <sup>3680 </sup> <n>she covered</n> בַּשְּׂמִיכָֽה׃ <sup>8063 </sup> <n>him with a mantle</n>
19: וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> אֵלֶ֛יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַשְׁקִינִי־ <sup>8248 </sup> <n>to drink</n> נָ֥א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>to her Please</n> מְעַט־ <sup>4592 </sup> <n>unto her Give me I pray thee a little</n> מַ֖יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>water</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> צָמֵ֑אתִי <sup>6770 </sup> <n>for I am thirsty</n> וַתִּפְתַּ֞ח <sup>6605 </sup> <n>And she opened</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נֹ֧אוד <sup>4997 </sup> <n>a bottle</n> הֶחָלָ֛ב <sup>2461 </sup> <n>of milk</n> וַתַּשְׁקֵ֖הוּ <sup>8248 </sup> <n>and gave him drink</n> וַתְּכַסֵּֽהוּ׃ <sup>3680 </sup> <n>and covered</n>
20: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Again he said</n> אֵלֶ֔יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to her</n> עֲמֹ֖ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>unto her Stand in</n> פֶּ֣תַח <sup>6607 </sup> <n>the door</n> הָאֹ֑הֶל <sup>168 </sup> <n>of the tent</n> וְהָיָה֩ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>shall be if</n> אִ֨ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and it shall be when any man</n> יָב֜וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>doth come</n> וּשְׁאֵלֵ֗ךְ <sup>7592 </sup> <n>and enquire</n> וְאָמַ֛ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>of thee and say</n> הֲיֵֽשׁ־ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>is there</n> פֹּ֥ה <sup>6311 </sup> <n>here</n> אִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>any man</n> וְאָמַ֥רְתְּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and says</n> אָֽיִן׃ <sup>369 </sup> <n>else</n>
21: וַתִּקַּ֣ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>took</n> יָעֵ֣ל <sup>3278 </sup> <n>Then Jael</n> אֵֽשֶׁת־ <sup>802 </sup> <n>wife</n> חֶ֠בֶר <sup>2268 </sup> <n>Heber's</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְתַ֨ד <sup>3489 </sup> <n>a nail</n> הָאֹ֜הֶל <sup>168 </sup> <n>of the tent</n> וַתָּ֧שֶׂם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and took</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמַּקֶּ֣בֶת <sup>4718 </sup> <n>an hammer</n> בְּיָדָ֗הּ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in her hand</n> וַתָּב֤וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>and went</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> בַּלָּ֔אט <sup>3909 </sup> <n>secretly</n> וַתִּתְקַ֤ע <sup>8628 </sup> <n>unto him and smote</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַיָּתֵד֙ <sup>3489 </sup> <n>the nail</n> בְּרַקָּת֔וֹ <sup>7541 </sup> <n>into his temples</n> וַתִּצְנַ֖ח <sup>6795 </sup> <n>and fastened</n> בָּאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>it into the ground</n> וְהֽוּא־ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> נִרְדָּ֥ם <sup>7290 </sup> <n>for he was fast asleep</n> וַיָּ֖עַף <sup>5774 </sup> <n>and weary</n> וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>So he died</n>
22: וְהִנֵּ֣ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> בָרָק֮ <sup>1301 </sup> <n>And behold as Barak</n> רֹדֵ֣ף <sup>7291 </sup> <n>pursued</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> סִֽיסְרָא֒ <sup>5516 </sup> <n>Sisera</n> וַתֵּצֵ֤א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>came out</n> יָעֵל֙ <sup>3278 </sup> <n>Jael</n> לִקְרָאת֔וֹ <sup>7125 </sup> <n>to meet</n> וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>him and said</n> ל֔וֹ לֵ֣ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Come</n> וְאַרְאֶ֔ךָּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and I will shew</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>thee the man</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> אַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> מְבַקֵּ֑שׁ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>whom thou seekest</n> וַיָּבֹ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>And when he came</n> אֵלֶ֔יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>her</n> וְהִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> סִֽיסְרָא֙ <sup>5516 </sup> <n>into her [tent] behold Sisera</n> נֹפֵ֣ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>lay</n> מֵ֔ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>dead</n> וְהַיָּתֵ֖ד <sup>3489 </sup> <n>and the nail</n> בְּרַקָּתֽוֹ׃ <sup>7541 </sup> <n>[was] in his temples</n>
23: וַיַּכְנַ֤ע <sup>3665 </sup> <n>subdued</n> אֱלֹהִים֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>So God</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>on that day</n> הַה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> יָבִ֣ין <sup>2985 </sup> <n>Jabin</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> כְּנָ֑עַן <sup>3667 </sup> <n>of Canaan</n> לִפְנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
24: וַתֵּ֜לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>pressed</n> יַ֤ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>And the hand</n> בְּנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> הָל֣וֹךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>heavier</n> וְקָשָׁ֔ה <sup>7186 </sup> <n>and prevailed</n> עַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> יָבִ֣ין <sup>2985 </sup> <n>against Jabin</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> כְּנָ֑עַן <sup>3667 </sup> <n>of Canaan</n> עַ֚ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>they</n> הִכְרִ֔יתוּ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>until they had destroyed</n> אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> יָבִ֥ין <sup>2985 </sup> <n>Jabin</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> כְּנָֽעַן׃ <sup>3667 </sup> <n>of Canaan</n> פ
